title: OSHA workplace safety posters (Job Safety and Health)
dataVisibleAfterVerification: Shows the issuer domain and the responder text (e.g., "Valid ID" or "Denied").
rationale: Prevents fake OSHA posters. Domain binding verifies DOL/OSHA (dol.gov). Federal posting requirement (all employers). OSHA inspection verification. Employee rights notification. $15,625 penalty per violation for missing/fake poster.
